asset_title: The End of Everything — Song Header
prompt: 3:1 dark header: dusk-to-night gradient, scorched horizon glow, low city silhouettes, ember points like distant fires, jagged ground crack, eclipsed sun-insignia at the vanishing point, subtle ash particles, bokeh, and a bottom fade for headline legibility.
creator: jh

rights.notes: Internal concept header artwork for Pop Song Summer.
